thread.section_title: Renaissance Paris La Defense Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellant Choice
thread.title_full: Excellant Choice - Review of Renaissance Paris La Defense Hotel, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: prof45
title: Excellant Choice
text:
I traveled to here for Business but also had the weekend to explore Pairs. The Renaissance was conveniently located to the business district as well as a 5 minute walk to the Metro. I cannot say enough great things about this hotel. The staff was extremely pleasant and attentive. The rooms were beautiful - we stayed in the Renaissance suite ( 2 adults and a teenager). The club lounge is perfect - very large and newly renovated. I highly recommend getting a room with access to the club lounge. Getting to Paris was so easy and it was nice to come back to a quite part of town. The Brasserie restaurant was also very good, the staff was great. The Renaissance exceeded my expectations and I will definitely be back.
Room Tip: Stay in a room that has access to the club lounge - worth the extra money See more room tips
